snippet.title: VS Puyo Puyo Sun All 7+ Combos | Sega Genesis Mini 2
snippet.description:
I made the most useless Puyo Puyo video. All characters are in line with the VS selection screen, and times are labeled. I'm disappointed with this game, Sega should have put more work into this demake. I mean, this isn't the first demake either, because this game was ported to the Game Boy Color in 1998 and it had a story mode.

0:00 - Intro
0:26 - Arle Nadja
0:40 - Draco Centauros
0:55 - Skeleton-T
1:06 - Harpy
1:19 - Choppun
1:34 - Incubus
1:48 - Suketoudara
2:01 - Kikimora
2:16 - Nohoho
2:29 - Kodomo Dragon
2:44 - Witch
2:57 - Zoh Daimaoh (Demon Lord Elephant)
3:13 - Honey Bee
3:29 - Ragnus The Brave
3:45 - Rulue
4:00 - Schezo Wegey
4:12 - Satan (Dark Prince)
4:25 - Carbuncle
4:41 - Outro

#SegaGenesisMini2 #PuyoPuyo #PuyoPuyoSun
_________________________________________________________________
